document.full_text: florida's center fielder missed much of last season, hurting his knee while making a shaving-cream pie attack on a teammate. the marlins no longer celebrate that way, but coghlan tries to maintain the joy of playing.
document.title: a moment of celebration, and months of recovery for coghlan
lines_and_colors: florida's center fielder missed much of last season, hurting his knee while making a shaving-cream pie attack on a teammate. the marlins no longer celebrate that way, but coghlan tries to maintain the joy of playing.
